summary: Tiny Tim is the smallest horse owned by Sorex Vinius at the Winking Skeever.
descriptionHtml:
Adds a tiny horse owned by Sorex Vinius. He should be on top of bar counter in the Winking Skeever in Solitude.
   He is rideable yet it does not look correct or right in any way (see pictures) xD Just for laughs


   Tiny Tim's texture is not mine and it was from the mod Posh Ponies - www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18211/? 
   Credit goes to Alienslof


   Hope you enjoy little Tiny Tim xD


   [color=#980000][b][size=3]UPDATE (9/11/2016) -[/size][/b]
[/color][size=2]   
[list]
[*]  Added a new optional file that includes a idle/riding sound requested by reyzark. 

[/list][/size]         The sound is part of a song called "Living In The Sunlight by Tiny Tim" [size=2]
[/size]
[list]
[*] Updated the main file and moved Tiny Tim outside of the Winking Skeever and made it so you can ride him without getting a bounty.
[/list][size=2]        (The main file does not include the song for Tiny Tim, he has all the normal horse sounds in that file)
[/size] 
[size=2]
[/size]
author: Jessica
